s: If Dave can let me know several days in advance when a telephone conference occurs (on Monday evenings) I can try to attend.
[the Greek sailor takes the hat, tries it on next]
[Jack is sitting alongside a wall, within earshot of Gibbs' table, trying to make his Compass work]
[Jack is running behind the wheel, trying to catch up and get the key that is still inside]
[Elizabeth tries to pick up the fallen rifle, but someone's foot holds it down]
